law.catch_line: Ignorance of human trafficking minor victim's actual age not a defense.
law.text: In any prosecution under KRS 529.100 or 529.110 involving commercial sexual activity with a minor, it shall not be a defense that the defendant was unaware of the minor's actual age.
law.history: Created 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 122, sec. 3, effective June 24, 2015.
